<DOMAIN>CONSULTANT</DOMAIN>
<RESUME_START>
CONSULTANT

OBJECTIVE

Enthusiastic Pharmacist with a variety of experience in community pharmacy including compounding and managerial experience.  Enjoys multitasking by working with other healthcare professionals and insurance providers to ensure optimal patient outcomes.  Thrives on working in a team environment to provide an efficient and positive patient experience.

LICENSES

In good standing with both Texas and Idaho State Boards of Pharmacy and a certified immunizer.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE


09/2016 to Current
Consultant
Company Name
— City , State
Experience in ACHC accreditation and compounding product development.  Pharmacy workflow solutions and marketing strategies.  Insurance billing knowledge including specialty medications, expertise in State Board inspections and license reciprocity process.

02/2016 to 08/2016
Pharmacist in Charge
Company Name
— City , State
Set up a newly purchased pharmacy that specialized in non-sterile compounding.  Created a logical and efficient system to process prescriptions, compounding, product verification, and shipping arrangements.  Developed many compounded medications such as topical analgesics, scar diminishing creams, and a variety of metabolic supplements.  Enjoyed managing a team to promote a positive and efficient work environment.

10/2015 to 02/2016
Staff Pharmacist
Company Name
— City , State
Gained initial non-sterile compounding experience.  Involved with processing, verifying prescriptions, and product verification.  Learned record keeping for compounding ingredients, batch and patient specific compounding.  Worked to create optimal workflow, product marketing, and develop business.

06/2012 to 10/2015
Staff Pharmacist
Company Name
— City , State
Pharmacist with diverse experience within the company.  Staffed at a high volume 24 hour store and a clinic store.  As staff pharmacist helped to manage operations, participated in drug utilization review and medication therapy management for multiple stores.  Promoted immunizations and enjoyed patient interaction and counseling.

SKILLS

Pharmacy operations Prescription compounding and dispensing Inventory control Non-sterile compounded medication development Business development
Team building
Patient counseling Microsoft Office
Intercom Plus BestRx

EDUCATION AND TRAINING

Doctor of Pharmacy
University of the Incarnate Word
— City , State
Bachelor of Science :
Economics
Texas A&M University
— City , State
<RESUME_END>

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Estimator (Stormwater)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Project Management, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Position: Senior Estimator (Stormwater/Utilities)Industry: Operational ServicesLocation: Remote
Hiring Immediately!
Are you highly motivated, hard-working, and seeking to join a growth-focused environmental consulting & engineering firm? Are you looking for a company that will invest in your development and grow your professional skills? If so, consider a career with Apex Companies.
Powered by record sales, extraordinary client retention, strategic acquisitions, and an entrepreneurial spirit, Apex Companies is one of the fastest growing environmental consulting and engineering firms in the US. We take pride in keeping our clients happy and have earned numerous awards for project excellence. We continue to grow, and we want you to grow with us.
Apex Companies, a leading national environmental consulting and services company, is seeking a Senior Estimator to support estimating stormwater projects throughout the nation. Projects typically range in size from $5K to $1M at commercial, retail, multi-family residential and municipal client sites.
This role will report directly to the Estimating Director, interact extensively with Apex’s National Account Managers, Regional Construction Managers and Regional Estimators, to manage proposal creation, project logistics, project performance, and client deliverables. This position will have a team of Regional Estimators that they will be responsible for managing proposals for uniformity, consistency and quality in addition to meeting strict deadlines.
Your Responsibilities as a Senior Estimator (Stormwater/Utility):· Manage and develop a team of estimators working on stormwater-related construction bid packages.· Review proposal opportunities and procure the relevant information to produce comprehensive construction bid packages.· Review deficiencies identified by Apex personnel to generate construction bid packages.· Contacting regulatory authorities to discuss aspects of violations.· Develop comprehensive scope of work to address the clients needs.· Create bid takeoff to determine quantities for bidding.· Contacting subcontractors to obtain cost quotes for projects and developing relationships for bidding purposes. Reviewing bids to ensure consistency.· Obtaining material cost quotes for proposals. Developing and maintaining material pricing databases for bidding purposes.· Meet client deadlines for proposal development and submission.· Working closely with a growth team on new client work development.· Occasional travel (5 -10%) to review projects or continuing education opportunities.· Actively participate in a culture of safe work practices.
What we're looking for:· Must have 4 or more years of experience as an Estimator for construction, stormwater, utilities, erosion control and/or excavation & grading projects.· High-level comprehension of construction processes, including familiarity with construction materials and estimating quantities.· Experience with estimating software preferred.· Ability to read site plans and develop cost estimates efficiently.· Valid driver’s license and a good driving history are required.· Experience with Deltek Vision is highly desired.· Stormwater experience is a plus.
Why you'll love working with us:· Company-subsidized medical and dental.· Company-paid life, short, and long-term disability.· Paid Time Off, 401k match, tuition assistance, and more.· Cross-training and the ability to work on a variety of projects.· Performance-based bonuses or other incentives.· Working with the best and brightest in the industry.· 1,000+ employee national firm with 50+ locations across the US.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
